name: Another Cat in Dungeons
description:
Another Cat in Dungeons is a sequence from A Cat in Dungeons.
It's puzzle game where you need to find the best path to the goal, walking trough turnable tabletops. Each level contains different obstacles and puzzles, including teleports and mechanisms.

Features


  • Turnable Tabletop: don't you know how to escape? Try to turn the tabletop!
  • Challenge levels
  • Solve riddles to avoid falling grounds
  • Use teleports
  • Use mechanisms to unlock doors and gates
